title: England vs Argentina: Has Elliot Daly finally arrived as an international full-back?
text:
Saturday evening brought the third consecutive England performance of Rugby World Cup 2019 that was rather difficult to evaluate.

Despite another comprehensive victory – and a winning margin of 29 points was their smallest in Japan so far – there is a feeling they are getting away with inaccuracies that could be punished by better opponents further down the line.

However, one aspect of their display in Tokyo was unquestionable. Elliot Daly produced an assured outing at full-back, arguably his best over 18 England starts in that position to date. He exuded calm and poise from the very start.

Early examination and determination

We begin from Argentina’s kick-off to start the game. England’s formation...
description: Saturday evening brought the third consecutive England performance of Rugby World Cup 2019 that was rather difficult to evaluate.
